class QSTEM::FlatAreaDetector¶

Basic flat area detector

Parameters

    - Pointer to Config Settings

  • persist -

    - Pointer to Persistence Manager

virtual void RecordImage(WavePtr w)¶

Record the wave after performing anscombe and mtf transformations

Parameters

    - Pointer to wave

virtual void MultiplyMTF(af::array wave)¶

Multiply by MTF

Parameters
  • wave -

    - wave to be multiplied

void anscombeNoise(af::array slice, float_tt dose)¶

Perform Anscombe Transform on the exiting wave

Parameters
  • slice -

    - exiting wave

  • dose -

    - Mean number of electrons per pixel
